description:
Money Wash Tycoon puts you in the business of cleaning money—literally. You’re the go-to expert when shady cash needs a fresh start. No guns, no car chases—just rubber gloves, industrial dryers, and a lot of questionable banknotes.

Pick up dirty deliveries in all forms—bags, boxes, even furniture. Sort through the mess, spot the fakes, scrub off the bloodstains (yes, really), and get the bills back to your clients looking spotless. Or, you know, keep a little extra for yourself. No one’s watching.

Upgrade your gear, unlock faster tools, and expand your underground operation. Between jobs, decorate your hideout, explore strange secrets, or throw some bills into the furnace just because you can.

It’s not glamorous, but it pays.
And at the end of the day, nothing smells quite as sweet as freshly laundered money.
